Enumeration# IntentParameter.Illuminance

iOS 17.0+iPadOS 17.0+Mac CatalystmacOS 14.0+tvOS 17.0+visionOSwatchOS 10.0+

```
enum Illuminance
```

Available when `Value` conforms to `_IntentValue`, `Value` conforms to `Sendable`, and `Value.ValueType` is `Measurement<UnitIlluminance>`.## [Topics](/documentation/appintents/intentparameter/illuminance#topics)
